record.id: syslanguage="en" and name="Delta Migration by Bg UNLs (Intro for Import)"
record.recordid: en - Delta Migration by Bg UNLs (Intro for Import)
record.name: Delta Migration by Bg UNLs (Intro for Import)

field.output: 1. Copy the whole target folder from the existing Service Manager system to this system.
field.property: Label;Caption=1. Copy the whole target folder from the existing Service Manager system to this system. Name=label1388740355160 Height=2 Name=label1388740355160 Width=133 X=8 Y=0

field.output: 2. Start scheduler "dmt.unload.load", it will start five small schedulers.
field.property: Label;Caption=2. Start scheduler "dmt.unload.load", it will start five small schedulers. Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=2

field.output: 3. Input the folder name in the next form, and the tool will create some background schedule tasks.
field.property: Label;Caption=3. Input the folder name in the next form, and the tool will create some background schedule tasks. Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=4

field.output: These background schedule tasks will import the delta data from the UNL files in the target folder.
field.property: Label;Caption= These background schedule tasks will import the delta data from the UNL files in the target folder. ?Caption= ?Visible= Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=6

field.output: 4. Wait until all these background schedule tasks finish.
field.property: Label;Caption=4. Wait until all these background schedule tasks finish. Caption=4. Wait until all these background schedule tasks finish. Height=2 Name= Width=133 X=8 Y=8
